# AVCaptionRegion.WritingMode.topToBottomAndRightToLeft

**Case**

A top-to-bottom and right-to-left writing mode.

## Declaration

```swift
case topToBottomAndRightToLeft
```

## Writing modes

- **AVCaptionRegion.WritingMode.leftToRightAndTopToBottom**: A left-to-right and top-to-bottom writing mode.
